name: COSMOS (itch) (Hades and Hermes)
description:
COSMOS is a first-person video game that narrates embodiment, sexuality, birth, rebirth, and death. It takes place in various cosmic or void environments where the game has a singular mechanic, depending on what body the player has chosen. The player will begin as a bodiless "ghost" and will be able to choose a character after entering a mirror room. Eventually, the player will be navigated to the river Styx where they can choose to play the game again or exit the game.

Keyboard and Mouse Control:

W  / ↑ - Move Forward

S  / ↓ - Move Backward

A  / ← - Move Left

D / → - Move Right

Left Mouse - Fly up; Right Mouse - Fly Down

Mouse control and moving backward are disabled in certain scenes.
